Using VS Code with Spring Boot Guides
relationships.tail: This guide provides instructions for setting up VS Code with Java and Spring Boot extensions, cloning a Spring guide project (e.g., REST Service guide), and running the application. It covers environment configuration, project importation, and execution of Spring Boot applications using initial and complete code sets.
